name: Games
body:
# Games

Simple implementations of a variety of classic games and some fun (well, maybe) variations.

## backgammon

The most ancient game.

## chess

A war of attrition.

Variations:

  - [Jetan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jetan) (Edgar Rice Burroughs' Martian chess)
  - 3D Chess

## dots

Also known as `pigpen`, `dots` is a two-player pencil-and-paper game.

Variations:
  - 3D boxes

## go

A game of conquest.

Variations:

  - Multiple board sizes
  - Othello
  - 3- or 4-player versions

## sprouts

A pencil-and-paper game with ["interesting mathematical properties"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sprouts_\(game\)).  Similar to `dots`.

## sudoku

Can you count to nine?  How about 0xf?  Board generator and solver for traditional 9x9 sudoku and a hexadecimal variation.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
